attributes.action: Make the punishment for animal abuse equal to the punishment for child abuse.
attributes.background: The current sentence for animal abuse is not enough because like children, animals are vulnerable. The punishment of being banned from owning an animal for ten years along with a small amount of jail time is not justice! After all is there really difference between animal abuse and child abuse?

rejection.details:
There are many different offences involved in child abuse which carry different sentences depending on specific circumstances. You can view the full list of offences here: https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/509614/domestic-violence-child-abuse-offences.pdf

You could start a new petition asking for a Parliament to change the law, to require a specific minimum sentence to be given to people found guilty of animal abuse.
